thread.section_title: Displayit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Displayit | displayit.com
thread.title: Candi Tebbs - Blaine Stone Lodge
thread.title_full: Displayit reviewed by Candi Tebbs - Blaine Stone Lodge

author: Candi Tebbs - Blaine Stone Lodge
title: Candi Tebbs - Blaine Stone Lodge
text:
We ordered our 10 Foot Flat Helium ExpressLine Display and we used it for the Dallas Bridal Show in Jan. 2017. Our booth looked great with that as our background. The LED lights made it pop even more! We had so many compliments on our booth and many vendors asked where they could get one. The display holder that turns into a table was the icing on the cake. Assembly was super easy, all the parts were easy to manipulate and the directions with "pictures too" made it go up fast. I would highly recommend this for your next trade show or the perfect back drop to any space that you want to market with confidence.
For a picture of our display, go to our Blaine Stone Lodge Facebook.
